name: Aware Bears Philosphical Club
purpose: Teaching and honing the skills required to  understand and apply different philososophical ideals in order to create a more well rounded and understanding student body.

name: Biomedical Engineering Club
purpose: The Biomedical club is concerned with creating an environment for students to discover the biomedical field.

name: Book Club
purpose: To bring together BHS students who enjoy reading and discussing literature.

name: Bowling Club
purpose: The bowling club will bring together students to interact and bond as they represent Bridgeland HS in bowling practices and competitions.

name: Bridgeland Theatre Company
purpose: To promote an extension of theatre curriculum and to engage students in theatrical activities and social opportunities beyond the classroom.

name: Calligraphy Club
purpose: The purpose of the calligraphy club is to help students learn, understand and enjoy calligraphy.

name: Claw Crew
purpose: To have a passionate and involved organization that promotes spirit and pride throughout Bridgeland.

name: Computer Science Club
purpose: To exploire computer science concepts as a team,

name: Creative Writing
purpose: To give students a safe space in which to share and get constructive feedback on their writing to challenge each other creatively, and to explore and hone their craft.

name: Dentistry Club
purpose: To broaden students knowledge and interest in dentistry as a career by exploring and becoming familiar with the dental field, participating in hands on dental activities, listening to presentations by guest speakers and understanding the pathway in to dental school.

name: Diamond Dolls
purpose: The purpose of this club shall be to encourage people to attend baseball games and strive to make the games as enjoyable as possible.

name: Divine by Design
purpose: The purpose of Divine by Design is to focus on  empowering, inspiring and developing students to do all things necessary to reach their full potential.

name: Ebony Excellence Society (EES)
purpose: EES's purpose is to celebrate the African American culture. We enlighten and empower students as we honor Black heritage in every meeting.

name: Environmentalist Club
purpose: The Environmentalist Club is concerned with informing and taking action regarding environmental concerns within our own community.

name: Family Career & Community Leaders of America
purpose: To promote personal growth and leadership development through Family and Consumer Sciences education.

name: French Club
purpose: To promote understanding of the French language, people and culture.

name: Future Business Leaders of America (FBLA)
purpose: The purpose of FBLA is to inspire and prepare students to become community minded business leaders in a global society through relevant career preparation and leadership experience.

name: Future Doctors of America
purpose: The purpose of this club is to motivate and educate students who wish to pursue a career in doctoral medicine.

name: Future Farmers of America (FFA)
purpose: A national student organization that promotes leadership, personal growth and career success in the field of agriculture.

name: HOSA
purpose: HOSA exposes students to various health careers through guests speakers, community service projects, and competition.

name: International Club
purpose:
To enhance global awareness and cultural diversity of the world through active cultural, social and academic activities. 
 The International Club also provides the student body with opportunities to become a global citizen through experiential learning.

name: International Science Club
purpose: The purose of this club is to allow students to research and develop Science Projects to present at ISEF science fairs.

name: Just Serve
purpose: Our purpose is to be a good influence for good in the community through meaningful service.

name: Key Club
purpose: Key club is concerned with volunteering in the Houston area to create a greater sense of community through selfless acts of kindness.

name: Korean Culture Club
purpose: To improve Asian inclusivity and spread awareness about the Koren culture.

name: Mental Health Alliance (MHA)
purpose: The purpose of MHA is to create a safe and informed environment through respectful discussions of serious topics to spread awareness and to promote and encourage help-seeking behavior and healthy mindfulness in the student body.

name: Model UN
purpose: The purpose of Model UN is to inform students on world matters and delegation. It also encourages students to verbally express matters of importance.

name: Music Volunteers Club
purpose: The purpose of MVA is to help students volunteer throughout the community through the gateway of music.

name: Muslim Student Association (MSA)
purpose: MSA is concerned with providing an educational outlook on Islam and clearning sterotypical misconceptions about Islam at BHS

name: National Honor Society (NHS)
purpose: The mission of NHS is to honor students who have excelled in scholarship, leadeship, service and character. The vision of NHS is to become an active and integral part of BHS in order to promote leadership, service and character.

name: National Speech and Debate Association (NSDA)
purpose: Speech and debate is an academic activity available to students. Speech and debate activities are challenging, competitive in nature and require regular practice, coaching, dedicaiton and hard work.

name: Ping Pong Club
purpose: To provide friendly competition and allow students to learn how to manage stress and maintain a healthy mental state.

name: Psychology Club
purpose: The Psychology club is concerned with promoting the general science of psychology both within the club as well as in the school.

name: Red Cross Club
purpose: Guided by the fundamental principles of the American Red Cross and its mission to prevent and alleviate human suffering in the face of emergencies by mobilizing the power of volunteers and the genorisity of donors, the club will learn, practice and exemplify humantarian values through mission-related service projects.

name: Science Olympiad
purpose: To create a close knit community of STEM focused learners that will proudly represent Bridgeland High School at the District, Regional State and National levels of Science Olympiad competitions.

name: Society of Women Engineers Next (SWENext)
purpose: The SWENext is concerned with the advancement of students in STEM through participation in competitions, engineering projects, career exploration and outreach events.

name: Spanish National Honor Society
purpose: The Sociedad Honoraria Hispanica is a world languages honor society for high school students enrolled in Spanish and/or Portuguese, nationally sponsored by the American Association of Teachers of Spanish and Portuguese.

name: Student Council
purpose: Student council is an organization to help govern make decisions for the school.

name: Table Top Club
purpose: The purpose of this club shall be to provide a safe place after school for anyone who wishes to engage in strategic thought and competition in a friendly manner with and/or against other students.

name: Texas Association of Future Teachers (TAFE)
purpose: To build leadership characteristics, collaboration skills and to learn about education will serving the community.

name: Technology Student Association (TSA)
purpose: TSA enhances personal development, leadership, and career opportunities in science, technology, engineering and math  (STEM) whereby members apply and integrate these concepts through extra curricular activities, competitions and related programs.

name: YLPA Sapphire Soul Sisters
purpose: To provide an opportunity for students to increase diversity and morale at Bridgeland through the introduction of stepping.

name: Young Investors Society
purpose: YIS is concerned with providing financial literacy education to all students.
